title: [Large-scale] Online Interactive Physics Experiments: Simulation-Based Education for Advanced Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Core physics concepts (Newtonian mechanics, energy conservation, etc.) and laboratory equipment usage experience
context.additional_context: Advanced physics lab education for general citizens, strengthening practical skills through online interactive simulations replicating real laboratory environments

learning_goals: Learners can manipulate virtual lab environments with 80% accuracy and collect data using H5P-based interactive videos
Simulate collaborative problem-solving processes and explain causal relationships between experimental variables via branching decision features in videos
Learners can express physical phenomena through mathematical modeling based on experimental results analysis and incorporate them into project reports.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Compatible Lab Simulation App
Physical Phenomena Measurement Auxiliary Teaching Toolkit

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
